pullrequest.title: New user interaction method and resize functionality

content.raw: I think this is a good thing to support in the future. When a model is scaled, the link cog locations and joint anchors re-position themselves accordingly. We also need to decided whether inertial properties should change or not. But for now scaling will just apply to simple shapes.
content.html: I think this is a good thing to support in the future. When a model is scaled, the link cog locations and joint anchors re-position themselves accordingly. We also need to decided whether inertial properties should change or not. But for now scaling will just apply to simple shapes.
